Pre-Game Insights: Rovman Powell was named as the captain of the West Indies T20I side while Roston Chase will be his deputy.
West Indies powerhouse batter Andre Russell is one of the notable misses from the 15-member squad as he requested CWI not to include him in the squad for the South Africa T20I series.
Former skipper Jason Holder has also been rested for the South Africa T20I series on account of workload management.

West Indies head coach Daren Sammy expressed his confidence in the squad they selected for the South Africa T20I series and believes that the SA series will be the best opportunity for them to reset and refocus with their game plan.
All three T20Is will be played at Brian Lara Stadium, Tarouba, Trinidad on August 23, 24, and 27 respectively.
